title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting 'Open With' from the context menu for a file in the Navigator, and choosing a different editor type for a file that is already open in the editor, nothing happens. The file remains open with the original editor.
EB: When selecting 'Open With' and choosing a different editor type for a file that is already open, the file should open in the new editor type, replacing any open editors for that file.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example. 2. Create a new basic project. 3. Create a new file named 'test.xml'. 4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'. 5. Right-click and choose 'Open With...'. 6. Select 'Default Text Editor'.
